analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/1/0x272f022a374fc7e9213b35952e167ea217303e18.sol:
	Contract VotingToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/1/0x272f022a374fc7e9213b35952e167ea217303e18.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

VotingToken.close (/unique_chucks/1/0x272f022a374fc7e9213b35952e167ea217303e18.sol#138-152) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-rewardToken.transfer(reward.refundWalletAddress,leftBalance) (/unique_chucks/1/0x272f022a374fc7e9213b35952e167ea217303e18.sol#150-151)

VotingToken.rewardVote (/unique_chucks/1/0x272f022a374fc7e9213b35952e167ea217303e18.sol#173-183) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-rewardToken.transfer(_from,rewardTokens) (/unique_chucks/1/0x272f022a374fc7e9213b35952e167ea217303e18.sol#181-182)
VotingToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/1/0x272f022a374fc7e9213b35952e167ea217303e18.sol#166-170) should be declared external
